term.title: Yukawa–Tsuno equation

item.text: A multiparameter extension of the Hammett equation to quantify the role of enhanced resonance effects on the reactivity of meta- and para-substituted benzene derivatives, e.g. log 10 k = log 10 k 0 + ρ [ σ + gives the enhanced resonance effect on the scale (σ + – σ) or (σ – σ), respectively.

item.alttext: log 10 k = log 10 k 0 + ρ [ σ +
